C0.title: My Introduction
C0.video_text:
Introduce Yourself
in 12 Seconds

- Your Name
- Your Village
- Your Work

C1.title: On my Business
C1.video_text:
In 30 seconds, show your place
of work from the outside
C1.audio_header: Talk about your business in 25 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What kind of business do you have?
- When did you start it?
- What is a typical day at work like?

C2.title: My Customers
C2.video_text:
In 20 seconds, show your place
of work from the inside
C2.audio_header: Talk about your customers in 15 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What kind of customers do you get?
- What services do you provide them?

C3.title: Electricity & Business
C3.video_text:
In 30 seconds, show some
work being done
C3.audio_header: Talk about electricity and your business in 25 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What do you run on your solar connection?
- Did you have any problems with government electrcity?
- What impact has the solar connection had on your business?

C4.title: Help from Grid Company
C4.video_text:
In 30 seconds, take a video
of the machines you run
C4.audio_header: Describe any help from the grid company in 25 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What plan do you have to grow your business?
- Have to taken a loan or machine from the mini grid company? Elaborate if yes. If no, then what would you get?

C5.title: Next Steps
C5.video_text:
Talk about your vision
for the future in 15 seconds

Where do you see yourself
a couple of years from now?

C0.title: My Introduction
C0.video_text:
Introduce Yourself in
15 seconds

- Your Name
- Your Village

C1.title: Home
C1.video_text:
In 30 seconds, take a video
of 5 of the 10 things below

Your house from the outside,
Your TV, A family photo,
Your children or relatives,
Your kitchen, Your vehicle,
Your favourite shirt, One room
in your house, A mirror, A cupboard

a1.audio_text: Sing your favourite song or recite a line from your favourite movie

C2.title: Village
C2.video_text:
In 40 seconds, take a video of
5 out of the 10 things below

A nearby shop, A road,
Electricity distribution wires,
A temple or mosque, The police
station, A school, An office,
A field / farmland, Your friend,
Your friend's house
C2.audio_header: Talk about a hobby in 15 seconds

a1.audio_text: Talk about one of your hobbies (anything counts!)

C3.title: Normal Day
C3.video_text:
Talk about a normal
day in 15 seconds

How do you typically
spend your day?

C4.title: Someone Else's Introduction
C4.video_text:
Take a video of someone else
in 20 seconds

Take a video of your friend
or relative
C4.audio_header: Talk about someone else in 15 seconds

a1.audio_text: Talk about your friend or relative

C5.title: My Philosophy
C5.video_text:
Talk about your philosophy
in 30 seconds

According to you, what is most
necessary to lead a good life?

C0.title: My Introduction
C0.video_text:
Introduce Yourself in
12 seconds

- Your Name
- Your Village
- Your Work

C1.title: My Family
C1.audio_header: Talk about your family in 20 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What lessons have you learnt from your family?
- What does family do in their free time?

C2.title: My Home
C2.audio_header: Talk about your home in 20 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What are the things close to your house?
- How many rooms does your house have?
- What is the best thing in your house?

C3.title: Electricity use
C3.video_text:
In 20 seconds, show
the appliances you run
on electricity
C3.audio_header: Talk about your electricity use in 20 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- How long have you had electricity in your house for?
- What is the difference between government electricity and mini grid electricity?

C4.title: Electricity Connection
C4.video_text:
In 25 seconds, take a
video of electricity being used
C4.audio_header: Talk about your electricity connection in 20 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What do you run on electricity in your home?
- What impact has solar had on your community?

C5.title: Next Steps
C5.video_text:
Talk about your next
steps in 15 seconds

What do you hope to
achieve in the future?

C0.title: Introduction + Business
C0.video_text:
- Take one wide shot of your
business from the outside (5 sec)
- Take a tracking shot walking
inside the building (5 sec)
- Take a panning shot of the
inside from one side (5 sec)

a1.audio_text:
- Introduce yourself (name, where you live) (5 sec)
- When did you start your business? (5 sec)
- Why did you choose this business? (5 sec)

C1.title: Business Introduction
C1.video_text:
Repeat the following line
with enthusiasm and joy:

'Yeh mera business hai.
Aaiye andar chalte hain.'

C2.title: Relationship with Mini Grid
C2.video_text:
- Have a friend or somewhere
close by take a video of you doing
some work in your shop (10 sec)
- Show a close up of the machine(s)
you run on your mini grid connection (5 sec)

a1.audio_text:
- What do you run on your solar connection?
- What impact has the solar connection had
on your business?
- Would you be able to run your business
without your mini grid connection?

C3.title: Business Overview
C3.video_text:
- What is a typical day at work like?
- What kind of customers do you get?
- What services do you provide them?

C4.title: Future Plans
C4.video_text:
- Have your friend take a video of
you against a wall. Refer to the
example video for this.

a1.audio_text: Where do you see yourself a couple of years from now? How do you want to expand your business?

C0.title: Scene 1
C0.video_text:
Introduce Yourself in
5 seconds

- Your Name
- Your Village
- Your Work

C1.title: Scene 2
C1.audio_header: Talk about your family in 5 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What lessons have you learnt from your family?
- What does family do in their free time?

C2.title: Scene 3
C2.audio_header: Talk about your home in 5 seconds

a1.audio_text:
- What are the things close to your house?
- How many rooms does your house have?
- What is the best thing in your house?

C3.title: Scene 4
C3.video_text:
Introduce Yourself in
5 seconds

- Your Name
- Your Village
- Your Work
